original_text: Gershon's clan had to take care of the Tent of Meeting, with the cloth that covered it, and the curtain at its door.
korean_text: 게르손 자손이 회막에서 맡을 일은 성막과 장막과 그 덮개와 회막 휘장 문과

sentences.original_text: Gershon's clan had to take care of the Tent of Meeting
with the cloth that covered it
and the curtain at its door
